content: easy flower coaster pattern great for scrap yarn projects which i often have too much of can t seem to get rid of my mini balls of yarn materials needed 4 5 mm crochet hook g+ 2 colors of yarn anything works from super fine cotton to super bulky fleece scissors optional tapestry needle for weaving in ends stitch terms slip_stitch - slip_stitch chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet increase - increase 2 stitches in one space pattern notes - all rounds begin with a chain but it does not count as a stitch - the parathensis at the end indicate the total number of stitches of that round ex 5 single_crochet would be a total of 5 single_crochet for the round - all rounds are joined with a slip_stitch please let me know if you like this pattern and if there is anything i can do to improve it happy crafting crocheters
